claimTotalSellingValue().notice: allows the creators/artists who up items to an auction to claim the total sold amount in the auction, this function needs hasDelivered to be true, only creators/artists can invoke, 40% of product sale

distributeFundsToPatrons().notice: distributes funds in this contract receiving from patrons to them, 50% of product sale

payOperationalCost().notice: pays 10% of product sale to Operations
